resources.string:
1. No Time Limit.
 2. Test consists of 10 questions.
 3. Each question carries 4 Marks.
 4. There is no negative marking.
 5. Correct answer will be displayed after choosing the option.

1. Test consists of 10 questions.
 2. 30 Minutes will be provided. After which test will be submitted automatically.
 3. Each question carries 4 Marks.
 4. +4 for every correct answer and -1 for incorrect.

1. Test consists of 90 questions.
 2. 30 Questions each from Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
 3. Each question carries 4 marks.
 4. +4 for every correct answer and -1 for incorrect.
 5. Test Duration will be of 3 hours(180 Minutes). After which test will be submitted automatically.

Although utmost care have been taken to provide high quality and error free questions, some human errors might have crept in.\n It would be highly appreciated if you help us identify those errors and help making the questions better.\n
